properties.areaDesc: Natrona County Lower Elevations; Southeast Johnson County; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Casper Mountain
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 12:53PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service in Riverton.

* WHAT...Snow with widespread total accumulations of 1 to 2
inches. Local snow totals could reach 3 to 5 inches in the
higher terrain. Snow in southeast Fremont and northern Natrona
counties Monday afternoon will shift toward Casper and Casper
Mountain prior to sunset.

* WHERE...Natrona County, southeast Fremont County, and southern
Johnson County.

* WHEN...Through 7 PM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will become more widespread across
southeast Natrona County prior to sunset. Cooling temperatures
and the setting sun will likely allow for accumulating snow on
area roads. Drivers heading north and west from Casper will
encounter slick and icy roads.

NWSheadline: Light to Moderate Snow Expected Monday Afternoon and Early Evening
